description: Dashboard for Spring Boot2.1 Statistics(based on Spring Boot2 Statistic by micrometer-prometheus).

targets.expr: irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{instance="$instance", application="$application", exception="None", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[5m]) / irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{instance="$instance", application="$application", exception="None", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[5m])

title: DHIS2 Application Metrics
